page.title: 03GAMES WE PLAY IN CLIFTON.
page.content: Once upon a time I was playing with my friend and we went into his bedroom to talk about dinosaurs. I have got a book about dinosaurs and it shows you how the world began,and goes on to amphibians and reptiles.When we have finished talking, we go back outside to play. I also hold a club in my bedroom about aeroplanes and the airforce. I have my friends in my bedroom and I have asked them to bring airforce books in.We have our own pads and pencils, and write about things which fly in the sky, such as helicopters, aeroplanes, hot-air balloons...in fact, all kinds of flying objects. When we have done that, we play at armies outside,altogether. When we are fed up with this, we play on Simon's climbing frame until dinner-time.
